mapper.insert: insert into annualHoliday_table(numId, btnId, holidayDate, totalVacations, usedVacations, restVacations) values (#{numId}, #{btnId}, #{holidayDate}, #{totalVacations}, 1, #{restVacations})
mapper.select: select count(usedVacations) from annualHoliday_table where numId=#{id};
select * from annualHoliday_table where numId=#{id} ORDER BY holidayDate asc;
SELECT * FROM annualHoliday_table WHERE numId=#{id} AND id=(SELECT MAX(id) FROM annualHoliday_table WHERE numId=#{id})
